name: Siege - VIC20
description:
Siege is a simple turn based strategy game (wargame).  It is made with 3 kilobytes for the unexpanded Commodore Vic-20.

Story: "The fortress is under attack! With only seven units left, defend against waves of invaders. The rear invading units are not clearly visible, and enemy reinforcements may enter from the top left of the screen."

Control with WASD keys or a JOYSTICK  (ARROW keys in emulation).  I recommend using a real Vic 20 or VICE emulator in NTSC mode (open the prg file in xvic.exe program).

NOTE: This is a "proof-of-concept" I hope to further develop.
